title: Unicornn
body:
I believe that a skin of Ornn called Unicornn (get it Unicorn Ornn) would be a very good addition to the game, perhaps for April Fool 2019. The abilities would go as so.

Q (Volcanic Rupture):
The rock would be some sort of cloud thing and there would be a rainbow above and around it. The animation for it travelling underground could also be a rainbow line travelling underground.

W (Bellows Breath):
This one's pretty obvious, spewing rainbows and the brittle indicator would be a Halo above the enemies head.

E (Searing Charge):
Not sure about this one, it'd be pretty generic. Any help in the comments?

R (Call of the Forge God):
A GIANT UNICRON RUNNING!

If anyone has any other ideas please comment so I can add more to this post. Thanks!

replies.body:
There are issues with mashing a champion's name with another word. There's a reason why we got *Pentakill Kayle* and not *Pentakayle*, although that was also due it being a skin named after a band.

The biggest reason is translation. Something like *Unicornn* may work in English, but then not translate well into other languages. There's no point having a unicorn pun if players in Korea miss out on the pun, either because they may not speak English or because the pun doesn't translate.

That said, it is a cool idea :)
That's actually a very good point that I have no counter to, but the question then is what happens to skins like Emumu? Or does that just translate fine?

I believe Emumu was created before such stringent localisation was in place, and given that the theme stands pretty well on it's own because of his character, it's not that big a deal.

More recent skins like Beemo and Birdio I gather were pretty carefully picked and named so everyone (or at least most) could be in on the puns. It's not *impossible* to do, but they tend to avoid it, and can't do it very often.
Im an Ornn main i like simple things like an ice/snow themed freljord Ornn skin or a Elder wood Ornn skin but i do like this also
